description: This file contains implementation of OVSDB (Open vSwitch Database) communication functions in C, including JSON RPC handling, monitor request creation, transaction construction, and utility functions for interacting with an OVSDB server.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_jsonrpc_id_new(void)
methods.description: Generates a new JSON RPC ID, incrementing a static counter, starting from 1.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_operation(ovsdb_tro_t tran)
methods.description: Returns a JSON string representing the transaction operation based on the enum value.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_mon_sel_isprefix(const char * column_ex)
methods.description: Checks if a monitor column string has the expected prefix flags.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_mon_tbl_val(int mon_flags,int argc,char * argv[])
methods.description: Creates a JSON array of column names for monitor requests, with optional operation flags.

methods.name: int ovsdb_write_callback(const char * buf,size_t sz,void * data)
methods.description: Callback function for writing JSON buffer to OVSDB socket.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_write(int ovsdb_fd,json_rpc_response_t * callback,void * data,json_t * js)
methods.description: Performs the actual write to the OVSDB socket, optionally storing the callback handler.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_method_send(int ovsdb_fd,json_rpc_response_t * callback,void * data,ovsdb_mt_t mt,json_t * jparams)
methods.description: Creates a JSON-RPC method call and sends it to the OVSDB server, handling callback setup.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_method_json(int ovsdb_fd,json_rpc_response_t * callback,void * data,char * buffer,size_t sz)
methods.description: Processes a JSON string buffer and sends it as a JSON RPC message to OVSDB, updating 'id' field.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_monit_call_argv(int ovsdb_fd,json_rpc_response_t * callback,void * data,int monid,char * table,int mon_flags,int argc,char * argv[])
methods.description: Creates and sends a monitor request with specified parameters.

methods.name: ovsdb_echo_call
methods.description: Creates and sends an 'echo' command in JSON RPC to OVSDB.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_row_filter_argv(json_t * row,int argc,char ** argv)
methods.description: Filters a JSON row object, keeping only specified keys.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_row_filtout_argv(json_t * row,int argc,char ** argv)
methods.description: Filters out specified keys from a JSON row object.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_special_value(const char * type,const char * value)
methods.description: Creates a JSON array representing an OVSDB special value (e.g., UUID).

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_uuid_json(const char * uuid)
methods.description: Creates a JSON array representing a UUID value for transactions.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_cond_single_json(const char * column,ovsdb_func_t func,json_t * value)
methods.description: Builds a JSON array representing a single condition for a transaction.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_cond_single(char * column,ovsdb_func_t func,char * value)
methods.description: Creates a condition JSON array with a string value.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_cond(ovsdb_col_t col_type,const char * column,ovsdb_func_t func,const void * value)
methods.description: Constructs a JSON array representing a condition with a specific operator.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_array_to_set(json_t * js_array,bool raw)
methods.description: Converts a JSON array into an OVSDB set representation.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_tran_comment(json_t * js_array,ovsdb_tro_t oper,json_t * where)
methods.description: Attaches a comment to a transaction array for debugging/auditing.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_tran_multi(json_t * jarray,json_t * js_obj,const char * table,ovsdb_tro_t oper,json_t * where,json_t * row)
methods.description: Builds a complex transaction array, possibly with multiple operations.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_insert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * row,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Creates a combined transaction to insert a row and update parent table with its UUID.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_tran_delete_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * uuids,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Creates a transaction to delete rows and remove their UUIDs from parent table columns.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_tran_call(int ovsdb_fd,json_rpc_response_t * cb,void * data,char * table,ovsdb_tro_t oper,json_t * where,json_t * row)
methods.description: Main function to construct and send a transaction request.
